title: Fans Accuse Justin Bieber of Mocking Taylor Swift
text:
Accusations come hard and swift when it comes to the Swifties, so, when Justin Bieber did an impression of Taylor Swift, some found it funny but others claim it's another example of bullying.

Bieber was rolling around the kitchen when he went Live on his Instagram. He was being filmed by his wife, Hailey when he evoked Taylor's viral video from the "Tonight Show."

Jimmy Fallon recently played a never before seen video that Swift's mom filmed after the star received Lasik surgery.

"It's not the banana that I wanted!" Bieber yelled while channeling Swift's confused, post-surgery state. "It not the right banana. It has no head!"

Hailey quickly said, "That was so funny," from behind the camera, clearly talking about Swift's banana meltdown.

Related:

Hailey Scratched Justin Bieber's Pink Lambo and He'll Never Let Her Forget It

Justin Bieber Says PETA 'Can Suck It' After Exotic Cat Backlash

Hailey Bieber Got a Champagne Shower At Second Wedding

Justin Bieber Wore His Grill During Wedding Portraits With Wife Hailey

'RHOBH' Star Lisa Rinna Claps Back at Justin Bieber on His Wedding Day

Swifties Think He's Mocking Her

Fans erupted with opinions about if the imitation was a form of flattery or if Bieber was throwing shade at Taylor.

"This is straight up mocking," one pro Swift fan said while another wrote, "can he shut up forever please and thank you."

True Beliebers

But not everybody felt that Bieber's impression was coming from a bad place.

"your fave went on tv & told her story with funny voices in a funny way as a literal SKIT bcuz she thought it was funny & wanted ppl to find it FUNNY," a Belieber said, "why y'all mad JB found it funny too?"

Taylor And Scooter

View photos

Swifties made sure to point out the troubled history between Justin and Taylor, with the most recent example being Swift's accusation that Justin and his manager Scooter Braun bullied her.

"Hey @scooterbraun you have the WORST clients ever," a Swiftie commented before others stated that they believe Braun is involved with every little bit of Taylor shade.

"He is the mastermind behind all these stupid stunts," another wrote.

Swift lashed out at Braun in June after he bought the rights to her first six albums.

At the time she said she was "sad and grossed out" that Braun is the owner of her early work.
